caption.p:
The effect of the hydromethanolic extract of the root bark of Clerodendrum myricoides on 24 hr urine volume in rats. Compared to HME: hydromethanolic extract ( a400, b200, c100 mg/kg); dcompared to F10: furosemide 10 mg/kg; ecompared to DW: distilled water. 1 P < 0.05; 2 P < 0.01; 3 P < 0.001. Key:
∗ (b3, c3, d3, e3),
∗∗ (c3, d3, e3), and
∗∗∗ (c1, e2) and #(e3), ##(e2), and ###(e1).
